welcome.salutation: Hello, and welcome to the Turnip Prophet app on your Nook Phone.
welcome.description: This app lets you track your island's turnip prices daily, but you'll have to put the prices in yourself!
welcome.conclusion: After that, the Turnip Prophet app will magically predict the turnip prices you'll have for the rest of the week.

first-time.title: First-Time Buyer
first-time.description: Is this your first time buying turnips from Daisy Mae on your island?(This affects your pattern)

patterns.title: Previous Pattern
patterns.description: What was last week's turnip price pattern?(This affects your pattern)

prices.description: What was the price of turnips this week on your island? (If this is your first time buying turnips, this field will be disabled)
prices.reset-warning:
Are you sure you want to reset all fields?

This cannot be undone!

textbox.description: After you've listed some turnip prices, the Turnip Prophet will run some numbers and display the different possible patterns that your island may experience.
textbox.development: This app is still in development, but will improve over time!
textbox.thanks: None of this would have been possible without Ninji's work figuring out just how Timmy and Tommy value their turnips.
textbox.support: Support, comments and contributions are available through Github
textbox.contributors-text: Oh! And let's not forget to thank those who have contributed so far!
